metadata.synopsis: Volo encourages the play to move on and begin their approach to entering High Hall
metadata.how_to_trigger: Finish dialogue with Volo and ShadowheartEnter dialogue with Volo

0.speaker: Volo
0.text: Heroics first, stories later. And in that spirit, after you.

1.speaker: Volo
1.text: Come along now, I can't very well write the ending until you've done it!
